info.title: Navigate backwards to an option in a listbox popup in interaction mode

setupScript.name: openListboxToApple
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox, and sets the focused option to 'Apple'

user: With focus on the listbox popup, navigate backwards by a single option.
instructions.raw: With focus on the listbox popup, navigate backwards by a single option.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Text of the focused option in the popup ('Choose a Fruit') is conveyed

Position of the focused option in the popup (1) is conveyed
